Minor in Biological Science: Minor in Biological Science The Minor in Biology consists of 23-24 semester hours. In keeping with the policy of the Biology major, any Biology grade below a C will not count towards the Minor.

courses.subject: BIOL
courses.title: Introduction to Evolution and Scientific Inquiry *

notes: Two (2) additional Biology courses, both of which must be 300-level or above.

Total Required Credits for the Program: 23-24 s.h. *Transfer students who have taken the equivalent of BIOL 01100 - Biology I and BIOL 01101 - Biology II at another institution are required to take BIOL 01202 - Biological Skills for Transfer Students, which will allow them to take BIOL 01204. This will complete the introductory sequence and allow them to take most Biology electives.
